text: Hi all, I am currently use 3 rest api from HubSpot for getting pageable and sortable list for blog posts/emails/pages. This integration looks good so far. I need to do same for form. But unfortunatelly what I observe api <https://api.hubapi.com/forms/v2/forms> return only array of elements. I do not see information of total elements and also I do not see options for sort. Do you have some hints how you handle pagination and sorting for complete list of forms ?

Hi all, anyone knows how to use the content-search to search through hubdb?
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/content/search-for-content>
The API documentation doesn't give example for this.

Hi, for simply usage I just use:
```curl '<https://api.hubapi.com/contentsearch/v2/search?portalId=9059388&term=test>'```

Hello everyone. I'm trying to fetch all blogposts from <https://api.hubapi.com/cms/v3/blogs/posts>. Is there any way to sort the posts by newest date? In v2 api I can sort the posts by providing negative parameter. How to do that in v3 api? Thanks!
<@U01KA87JHRV> you can pass the `sort` parameter and it accepts ``name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt``

That works for blog posts. However, I'm trying to get the HUBDB contents.
We can see there's `hubdbQuery` and `tableId` but I'm still not able to use it.

Hi everyone. I am struggling to find documentation about retrieve information from external APIs into our custom modules in HS. I have endpoints and api-key for the API calls, but I just can’t figure how to manage the API calls from HubSpot?
Should be in Serverless functions. If I am getting you right. :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks <@U011UH5NZM4>!! That looks right :pray:

Thanks for the answer. I knew that parameter but the thing is createdAt will only sort the posts in descending orders. I want it to be ascending. Previously in v2 API I can provide the sort parameter with value -createdAt
I see that this api require term param. Worth to ask if you include it. Besides that I have no other hint :confused:

I have added some properties to deals and when I pass those parameters, I get an error:
 
ERROR: Invalid input JSON on line 1, column 634: Cannot construct instance of `com.HubSpot.ecommbridge.core.models.v2.ExternalSyncMessage`, problem: properties value
Any ideas?
I'm sending values to the api v2 for deal properties and without getting any error, those values are not getting set. How can I debug this further?
Hello, I'm looking for an example for bulk importing deals (via a CSV file) with an associated company for each deal. Anyone have an idea where I might find that? Thanks!

Hi everyone! Im struggling to find a way to have MRR in a forecast report based on deals/deal stages & line Items. Basically to see the MRR for every deal in all deal stages but nor the line Items or deals have a shared property/key to link between them when using the different object types. Anyone else been struggling with this to find a solution?

i got this error today while creating a contact via API, any recommendations? i want to allow urls in the first name....
```   'Property values were not valid: [{"isValid":false,"message":"\\"<http://Beldeur.nl|Beldeur.nl>\\" contains a URL","error":"CONTAINS_URL","name":"firstname"}]',
  correlationId: 'a7a66654-7716-472e-a9fe-b077a3f0230a',```
Hello, is there a way to enroll a contact to a workflow or a webhook if he was added to any list, not a specific one?

hello! i got the following 400 error when creating a company property with field type of HubSpot User via the api (v3):
```"{status":"error","message":"Property \'support_owner\' has no options but options are required!","correlationId":"e38f859e-bba8-47e3-b3db-d056f5d801a5","propertiesErrorCode":"PROPERTY_INVALID"}'```
Can anyone advise on how I can create this type of property via the API? When I pull this type of property from the API, it does not have any options listed - so I am confused as to why I am getting this error. A few more details to follow in thread.

I am trying to clone the properties from my production HubSpot portal to my development portal.

I pull the properties  (in our production portal) from the API, there is one property set up like:

```"name":"support_owner",
"label":"Support Owner",
"type":"enumeration",
"fieldType":"OWNER",
"description":"",
"groupName":"account_management",
"options":[
],
"createdUserId":.....```
When i post to the API to create this same property in my devlopment portal, i get the error that i mentioned.

I have tried including other fields but have not been able to get it to work. This is what i attempted to post last time:
```{
"name":"support_owner",
"label":"Support Owner",
"type":"enumeration",
"fieldType":"OWNER",
"groupName":"account_management",
"externalOptions":true,
"options":[
]
}```
Note: I am creating multiple properties in 1 batch via <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/companies/batch/create> enpoint

Hey <@U6GNQ7JBU> tagging you here -- I'm not sure if the customer has DM you yet, but he reached out again for a response.

This is the customer I was telling you about on 14 Jan (in support-content-tools) wanting to know _if we can set to enable ('no-cors') in header of webpage._ Could you follow up with him please? Thank you!
